page.title: 14MY FREETIME IN BLAGDON
page.content: In my free time I go to a{BMX track, which has been built on the Mead for us, behind the{tennis courts.}I just go around and try new tricks like a Camel kick at the edge of the quarter pipe.You go up to the edge of the quarter pipe and pull on front brake. So that the back wheel goes up and down again.Then you have to dive away but all this has to be done with out your feet touching the ground. Sometimes in my freetime I go to the {swing and pipes}there on the Mead. In the summer my mum takes me to {Coombe Lodge}which is staff training college.There is a{swimming pool, which pool can only be used by staff and close relations.The people who are staying there are allowed to go swimming but if the pool is cold you can play{tennis.
